title: Ashley Hart flaunts her incredible figure in a leopard print bikini at Bondi Beach
text:
She's known for her incredible figure, being a model and yoga enthusiast.

And on Saturday, Ashley Hart showcased her best assets as she enjoyed a swim at Sydney's Bondi Beach.

The 30-year-old Australian stunner took a dip in leopard print bikini bottoms which she matched with a yellow bikini top, and at one point, her blogger friend Caroline Groth could be seen cheekily pinching her pert derriere.

Taking a walk on the wild side! Ashley Hart (pictured) flaunted her incredible figure in a leopard print bikini at Bondi Beach on Saturday... before a female friend cheekily pinched her pert derriere

Ashley showed off a soft golden glow on the day, with her bikini bottoms being high-waisted.

The LA-based blonde had her short locks tied up and off her face into a high bun, but took out her scrunchie for the dip.

Ashley - who is the sister of model Jessica Hart - went makeup free on the day.

Having a laugh: She appeared in high spirits while out with her blogger friend Caroline Groth, (R) with the pair taking selfies before Caroline could be seen pinching Ashley's derriere

She's a beach babe! Ashley showed off a soft golden glow on the day, with her bikini bottoms being high-waisted

She appeared in high spirits while out with her blogger friend Caroline Groth, with the pair taking selfies before Caroline could be seen pinching Ashley's derriere.

Later in the day, Ashley went out with a bunch of friends to help celebrate Caroline's 30th birthday at North Bondi Fish.

Ashley has plenty to smile about these days, as her romance blossoms with American ski lodge entrepreneur Brett Leve.

Time to celebrate! Later in the day, Ashley went out with a bunch of friends to help celebrate Caroline's 30th birthday at North Bondi Fish

New man: Ashley has plenty to smile about these days, as her romance blossoms with American ski lodge entrepreneur Brett Leve (R)

She confirmed her new romance earlier this month, and last week took to Instagram with a series of romantic snaps with her partner, 35, at a luxury Utah resort.

'The hills are alive with the sound of infinite possibility, community, abundant creativity and true beauty,' she captioned her post, making sure to tag Brett alongside a love heart and butterfly emoji.

Brett also shared some sweet snaps of himself with Ashley, with Ashley commenting underneath: 'My favourite arms and place to be held in'.

Ashley was previously married to Buck Palmer but the pair parted ways after just two years of marriage in 2017.
description: She's known for her incredible figure, being a model and yoga enthusiast.
authors: David Wu For Daily Mail Australia
